sentences.sentence: Mesenchymal stem cells can differentiate into bone, cartilage or fat cells.
sentences.translation: 间叶干细胞能够分化成为骨、软骨或脂肪细胞。

sentences.sentence: Mesenchymal stem cells help repair damaged tissue and organs by renewing injured cells.
sentences.translation: 间充质干细胞通过更新受损细胞，修复受损的组织和器官。

sentences.sentence: We have what are called mesenchymal stem cells. This type of stem cell goes on to become either fat or bone.
sentences.translation: 间质干细胞是一种有分化潜能的干细胞，它可以分化成脂肪细胞或者骨髓细胞。
